page.title: 17Maypole dancing at Ridgeway
page.content: Mrs. Jackson helped us to learn Maypole dancing. We began with the{ {"Circle Dance"}in which we had an outer and an inner ring. The outer ring danced followed by the inner. It was hard to keep in time. In the{"Rope Dance"}3 people danced round a kneeling person, their braids twisted round the kneeler's braid. The {"Spider's Web"}was made by weaving in and out of radiating braids to make a criss-cross shape. {"Single and Double Plaiting"}was very hard as we had to weave to the right and left of each other. We made a lovely plait on the pole. The{"Liberty Horse"}dance was easier. Four groups made a cross shape around the pole and circled in stages, moving like horses with high knees. We had great fun.
